Class BoardView

java.lang.Object
gui.views.boardview.BoardView
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIView
public class BoardView extends Object implements GUIView

The BoardView, displays the logged User's Noticeboards and enables the user to add, modify and delete Noticeboards and their ToDos and to use the advanced ToDo search functions.

    (package private) void

    Refreshes the current BoardComponents.
    void
    reloadBoardComponents()
    Invalidates the cached Noticeboards and reloads the associated BoardComponents.
